akn:section.akn:heading: Application for merchant bank charter; review and approval or disapproval of application.

akn:content.akn:p: A person described in ยง 26-833.09(a) may apply for a merchant bank charter by filing a written application with the Commissioner. The application shall include such information as the Commissioner may require by regulation and shall be on such forms and in accordance with such procedures as the Commissioner may prescribe by regulation.

An application submitted under subsection (a) of this section shall be approved or disapproved in writing by the Commissioner within 60 days after a complete application is submitted to the Commissioner. The Commissioner and the applicant may agree to extend the review period for an additional 60 days.
The Commissioner shall not issue a merchant bank charter to the applicant unless:
